channel.title: environment on krei
channel.description: Recent content in environment on krei

item.title: Dev Env
item.description: krei requires a certain set of software installed on your system in order to be built. Prerequisites git for version control minisign to sign the waiver as a contributor gpg to sign your the commit which adds the waiver Manual Setup Java JDK to compile the code Maven to build the project hugo in order to create the website ilo Setup ilo to open the predefined build environment podman or docker as an ilo runtime GitHub Packages Some of krei's dependencies are only available in GitHub packages which requires authentication.
